title: 'They bombed our civilian compatriots': 'Dozens' killed after Pakistan conducts airstrikes in Afghanistan
summary_full: Afghanistan reported dozens killed and wounded after Pakistan conducted airstrikes in eastern border provinces, targeting alleged militant camps. Pakistan stated the strikes were in response to recent suicide attacks, including one by an Afghan national. Tensions escalate as Pakistan warns of further action if Afghan soil is used for terrorism.
